author: USA TODAY, Christine Brennan, USA TODAY
title: IOC member says that 2020 Tokyo Olympics will be postponed due to coronavirus pandemic
description: Veteran IOC member Dick Pound told USA TODAY Sports that "postponement has been decided" for the 2020 Olympics, and that it won't start July 24.
content:
Veteran International Olympic Committee member Dick Pound told USA TODAY Sports Monday afternoon that the 2020 Tokyo Olympic Games are going to be postponed, likely to 2021, with the details to be worked out in the next four weeks.
